Clefairy (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0034: Nidoking
Pokémon
#0036: Clefable →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Clefairy (TCG Pocket).

Clefairy has been featured on 31 different cards since it debuted in the Base Set of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Clefairy cards are normally Psychic-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Clefairy

Clefairy
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
